short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool remove ability to tweet, retweet. Also favourite and reply buttons removed from twitter page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension removes tweet, retweet, favourite and reply buttons from Twitter page.
So you will use Twitter in read-only mode as news stream.
